text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters That lying mouthpiece for Bunker Boy seems to think that BLM protests and trump rally’s are the same thing?? BLM protests are needed the trump rallies are not.  The trump rallies are an unnecessary way of spreading the coronavirus!
